Be A Voter This Election Season

Check out our Get Out the Vote resource page for all the links and information you need to be a voter this election season.

Be A Voter

{include "default_salutation"} –

When our democracy has been on the line, the ACLU of Minnesota has been there to protect our founding principles of justice, liberty, and equity.

Today, as we confront unprecedented new challenges, it's not enough to fight for our democracy in the courtrooms and on the streets. We need people like you to take the fight to the voting booth.

Here's the thing, {include "first_name"}. The people who spread fear and sow doubt in our election process want to divide and silence us, instead of leading us through the frightening times we're facing. But Minnesotans know that we are strongest when we work together, listen to every voice, and commit to being voters – that's why, year after year, Minnesota has one of the highest rates of voter turnout in the country.

Don't wait until Election Day. Take action to be an early voter and protect our precious civil liberties today.

Be a Voter, Educate a Voter

This year, with the stakes higher than ever, we're asking you to take another step. We need supporters like you to be voters, and we need you to join our volunteer team.

Join us for our outdoor, socially distanced event "Be a Voter, Educate a Voter: Volunteer Kick-Off" tomorrow, Friday, September 25, from 3 p.m. to 5 p.m.

Learn how you can join our historic effort to educate every person in Minnesota about whether, when, where, and how they can be voters. You can register to vote or check your registration, pick up a free T-shirt, and sign up to phone bank, text bank, and distribute educational materials to potential voters in your community.

This is our time. Join us in the fight.

ACLU of {affiliate_name}
